```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
turnout_data <- read_excel("SYE data sheet.xlsx",
 col_types = c(
 ))
turnout_data %>% group_by(Horse) %>% summarise(mean(Overall))
turnout_data %>% group_by(Personality) %>% summarise(mean(Overall))
ggplot(data = turnout_data, mapping = aes(x = Personality, y = Overall)) +
  geom_point()

```
